gloss: A wave, especially one of length, which spreads across the sea or a river.
A series of similar events, usually of a similar duration and intensity.
A wavelength of sound, light or other electromagnetic wave, especially one that is shorter than a wavelength of light but longer than a wavelength of radio waves.
